title: MCP Servers
lede: Connect and manage Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers to extend AI agent capabilities.

sections.title: MCP Server Overview
sections.content:
MCP servers provide additional tools and resources that your AI agents can use during conversations.

MCP Features:

  • Tool Extensions: Add new capabilities to your agents
  • Data Sources: Connect to external databases and APIs
  • Custom Functions: Implement specialized business logic
  • Protocol Compliance: Standardized communication interface

sections.title: Server Management
sections.content:
Install, configure, and manage MCP servers for your organization.

  • Server Installation: Install from marketplace or custom servers
  • Configuration: Set up server parameters and authentication
  • Health Monitoring: Monitor server status and performance
  • Version Management: Update and rollback server versions
